amendment.description: Page 5, line 9, before the semicolon, insert "and the percentage of such individuals whose employment is in an area that matches their previous training and work experience".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 115-187 to require states to report on the number of individuals who are in a career that matches their training.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Krishnamoorthi amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 380 - 32 (Roll no. 320).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Krishnamoorthi amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 380 - 32 (Roll no. 320).
